## Data Science Series
Dr. Rebecca Barter has put together a series of data science programming that will be rolling out this fall. Each course will run for four weeks with an asynchronous lecture, virtual office hour session, and project based assignments each week and will be taught in either R or Python. The series will include the following modules: introduction, data cleaning, data visualization, and modeling. \
  
### Introduction to R
**When:** August/September 2023\
**Where:** Virtual\
**Instructors:** Rebecca Barter
